transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Kaun?
Executive: Good afternoon, I am speaking from IndiaMART Mukesh.
Customer: Aap kahan se bol rahe hain?
Executive: This call is now being recorded. IndiaMART se Mukesh bol rahi hu, kya baat kar rahe hain IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Bolo.
Executive: Mukesh sir mujhe puchna tha aapki teen categories hain jo aapne block kari hain. Ek hai alligators, ek hai industrial air blowers.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aap inme deal nahi karte?
Customer: Nahi karte hain na.
Executive: Aapne block kyun kar rakha hai sir?
Customer: Arre wo usme maine dekha nahi hoga.
Executive: Sir ye unblock aap hi ki side se hoga sir.
Customer: Matlab actually ho gaya hoga mistake aap.
Executive: Sir.
Customer: Use unblock kar dijiye.
Executive: Sir unblock aap hi kar payenge aap online mein aapko bata deti hu.
Customer: Open karke khol lunga usko kar lunga main open karke.
Executive: Lekin aapko ye kaise pata hoga unblock kahan se karna hai?
Customer: Abhi main filhal agar aap video meeting pe aate magar main kahin baitha hu. Iske liye mere ko samay dena padega aapko.
Executive: Theek hai to aap koi baat nahi aap jab bhi free ho aap call kar lijiyega.
Customer: Main free hoke aapko aapke us number pe main lagata hu phone. Us time main bank mein tha abhi filhal main inke paas hu. Hai na?
Executive: Theek hai aur waise sir mujhe video meeting ki requirement nahi hai. Mujhe normally main help kar dungi aapki but aap mujhe please connect zarur karega.
Customer: Koi koi koi baat nahi.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's categories are blocked.

- Wants to unblock categories.



Resolution:

- Executive explained unblocking can be done online.

- Customer will unblock when free.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- categories, unblock, video meeting
